title: translating data first into binary
extract: Updated: 11/13/2018 by Computer Hope. Computers convert text and other data into binary by using an assigned ASCII value. Once the ASCII value is known that value can be converted into binary. In the following example, we take the word hope, and show how it is converted into binary that the computer understands.Nov 13, 2018
